original: @136a 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs /
analyzed: @136a 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs /
translated: The Dhāraṇī of the Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Mother, the Perfection of Wisdom!

original: tadya th'a / aom pra dzny'a pra dzny'e /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom pra dzny'a pra dzny'e /

original: pradzny'a aa pa bh'a sa pradzny'a ba lo ki te sarba dharma aan dha k'a ra bhi dharma ni /
analyzed: pradzny'a aa pa bh'a sa pradzny'a ba lo ki te sarba dharma aan dha k'a ra bhi dharma ni /

original: siddhantu m'am bha ga ba ti /
analyzed: siddhantu m'am bha ga ba ti /

original: sarba dzny'a na san dha ri /
analyzed: sarba dzny'a na san dha ri /

original: bha ga ba ti bad tshe la /
analyzed: bha ga ba ti bad tshe la /

original: pra sa ra te hasta ma ma su ka ra /
analyzed: pra sa ra te hasta ma ma su ka ra /

original: kam pa kam pa /🔽p'a la p'a la /
analyzed: kam pa kam pa / p'a la p'a la /

original: aa gatstsha bha ga ba ti m'a bi lamba sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aa gatstsha bha ga ba ti m'a bi lamba sv'ah'a /

original: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By holding this, the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines will be held.

original: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All karmic obscurations will be purified.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i @136b gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i @136b gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of the noble perfection of wisdom in twenty-five thousand lines is complete.
